00036 #ifndef PACC_Date_hpp
00037 #define PACC_Date_hpp
00038 
00039 #include <string>
00040 #include <ctime>
00041 
00042 namespace PACC {
00043     
00044     using namespace std;
00045     
00054     class Date {
00055      public:
00057         Date(void) : mTime(::time(0)) {}
00058         
00060         explicit Date(unsigned int inSeconds) : mTime(inSeconds) {}
00061         
00063         Date(unsigned int inYear, unsigned int inMonth, unsigned int inDay);
00064         
00066         unsigned int operator-(const Date& inDate) const {return mTime-inDate.mTime;}
00067         
00069         Date operator-(unsigned int inSeconds) const {Date lDate(mTime); return lDate -= inSeconds;}
00070         
00072         Date& operator-=(unsigned int inSeconds) {mTime -= inSeconds; return *this;}
00073         
00075         Date operator+(unsigned int inSeconds) const {Date lDate(mTime); return lDate += inSeconds;}
00076         
00078         Date& operator+=(unsigned int inSeconds) {mTime += inSeconds; return *this;}
00079         
00081         string get(const string& inFormat = "%a %b %d %T %Z %Y") const;
00082         
00084         unsigned int getDayOfMonth(void) const;
00085         
00087         unsigned int getDayOfWeek(void) const;
00088         
00090         unsigned int getDayOfYear(void) const;
00091         
00093         unsigned int getHourOfDay(void) const;
00094         
00096         unsigned int getMinutesOfHour(void) const;
00097         
00099         double getSecondsOfMinute(void) const;
00100         
00102         unsigned int getMonthOfYear(void) const;
00103         
00105         unsigned int getTimeInSeconds(void) const {return mTime;}
00106         
00108         unsigned int getYear(void) const;
00109         
00111         void setDate(unsigned int inYear, unsigned int inMonth, unsigned int inDay);
00112         
00114         void setTime(unsigned int inHour, unsigned int inMinutes, unsigned int inSeconds);
00115 
00116      protected:
00117         time_t mTime; 
00118         
00119     };
00120     
00121 } // end of PACC namespace
